[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1476023831779{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Certified course in” font_container=”tag:h5|font_size:16px|text_align:left|color:__USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1595945163661{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Google Adwords” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1595945122178{margin-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”title-heading”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]Google Ads (formerly AdWords) is still the core of many companies’ interactive campaigns & an Integral part of their ROI model.

This Google ads workshop is a detailed introduction to all aspects of Google Ads. Learn about Google Ads and walk away with an understanding of the essential elements needed to create successful paid campaigns via Google.

We conduct the Google Ads Workshop for students & professionals regularly. This is our fast track Google Adwords course for those who want to be professional in less time. This course is mainly designed to cover all from basic to advance level of Google Adwords course with the inductive & practical training model.

For more information about the topics covered in class, please refer to the syllabus below.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_tta_accordion][vc_tta_section title=”Google Ads Marketing workshop (Training + Setup)” tab_id=”1595945325059-8f090666-1e3e”][vc_column_text]

  1. Introduction to Online Search
  2. How Does Search Engine work?
  3. SEO Vs Google Ads
  4. Introduction to Google Ads
  5. Understanding Campaign & Ad group
  6. Different types of Ads
  7. Importance of Keywords in Google Ads
  8. Ads: Bidding Process.
  9. Ads: Understanding Impressions, Clicks, CTR, etc (Demo)

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Hands-On” tab_id=”1595945325105-988b7900-fd74″][vc_column_text]

  • Creating Campaigns/ AD Group
  • Defining Ads
  • Searching for Keywords
  • Optimizing Keywords

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”9735″ img_size=”400×400″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://www.instamojo.com/digitalconsultingpandit/2-days-workshop-on-google-ads/?ref=store”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

Fees : On Request.
Duration : 2 days.
Pre-requisite : Basic Knowledge of Internet & Computers
[vc_column_text]

Contact Us for more Details

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”20px” el_class=”unwanted-height”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator color=”orange”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Similar Courses” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:40px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1590054429464{margin-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”title-heading”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]
